programme.title: Independence Day 1990
programme.short_synopsis: What the French think of Independence Day, and does the US conform to British stereotypes?
programme.medium_synopsis: A French insight in to Independence Day, the British stereotype of American pastimes, and a travel guide for tourists visiting New York State, as discussed by Alistair Cooke.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
